entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:41 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.4°C
